attributes.action: extend the anti-smoking legislation, to include designated non smoking areas in streets, parks and precincts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In a similar way that local authorities are allowed to ban drinking alcohol in some public places, the creation of smoke free zones in shopping streets, pedestrian precincts, plus parks and other open places should be permitted. This way non-smokers are not exposed to harmful passive smoke while enjoying a day out.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
